channel.title: Lyrics Analysis on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Lyrics Analysis on Memo Tut

item.title: Natural language processing for busy people
item.description: #Overview for busy people I tried linguistic processing, inspired by the article Ore program Ugocas Omae Genshizinaru. I like the old story “Busy People Series” 1, so I used the summary API of COTOHA API I tried to make a song for busy people. *Note Although the lyrics summarized in the output result of the code below (black background part) appear, it is used for the purpose of research on language processing in accordance with Article 32 of the Copyright Act.
